title: Switch to Long-Term Thinking: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Dec. 5, 2025

title: Bitcoin ETFs Just Shed $194 Million—Highest in Two Weeks
contentSnippet: Analysts argue this could mean institutional investors are continuing to unwind leveraged positions and basis trades.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Slides to $91K as ETF Outflows Deepen Market Anxiety
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s early week rally unraveled as sharp ETF outflows, aggressive derivatives deleveraging and muted altcoin reactions to catalysts pulled the broader crypto market lower.

title: EU Seeks to Transfer Crypto Oversight to Bloc's Securities and Markets Authority
contentSnippet: The European Commission wants to get rid of fragmentation from differing supervisory approaches in member states.

title: BlackRock’s IBIT Faces Record Outflow Run as Bitcoin Struggles to Reclaim Bull Trend
contentSnippet: Another $113 million exited on Thursday, putting the fund on track for a sixth week in the red, its longest streak since debuting in early 2024.

title: International operation busts crypto fraud network that laundered more than $815 million
contentSnippet: Coordinated raids led to arrests, multimillion-dollar seizures, and the disruption of key infrastructure, according to Europol.

title: Polymarket Hiring In-House Team to Trade Against Customers — Here's Why It's a Risk
contentSnippet: The prediction market’s move toward internal market making could blur the line with sportsbooks and undermine the platform’s neutrality, experts warn.

title: Italy warns crypto firms to meet year-end MiCA deadline or shut down
contentSnippet: Italy's regulator reminded crypto firms and investors to pay close attention to the Dec. 30 deadline for complying with the EU's MiCA rules.

title: Kraken Launches High-Touch VIP Program for Ultra High Net Worth Clients
contentSnippet: Kraken VIP members are paired with a specialist relationship manager, backed by 24/7 support and early insight into Kraken’s full product ecosystem.

title: Italy Launches 'In-Depth' Review of Crypto Risks
contentSnippet: Regulators launch probe months after Italy's central bank warned that crypto's mainstream integration poses systemic financial dangers.

title: Spot bitcoin ETFs see $195 million exit, largest daily outflow in 2 weeks
contentSnippet: The ETFs' trading volume fell to $3.1 billion on Thursday, compared to $4.2 billion on Wednesday and $5.3 billion on Tuesday.

title: Solana, XRP, ETH Extend Losses as Bitcoin’s $91K Support Back in Focus
contentSnippet: The one-month chart shows BTC still locked inside a descending structure from early November’s highs, with the latest rebound producing another lower high.

title: EU Opens Antitrust Probe Into Meta's New AI Policy For WhatsApp
contentSnippet: The EU Commission’s probe excludes Italy, where the country's competition authority is already pursuing separate proceedings against Meta.

title: DOGE ETF Buzz Meets Bearish Reality as Dogecoin Prints Fresh Lower Lows
contentSnippet: Technical analysis shows DOGE failed to hold key support levels, suggesting continued downside unless buyers reclaim critical price points.

title: Precious Metals Soar, Bitcoin Stalls as Investors Hedge Fed 'Policy Error'
contentSnippet: Markets are hedging a Fed misstep, driving gold and silver higher while Bitcoin lags as traders reassess risk.

title: XRP at Risk of $2.05 Retest, Analysts Warn, as Bitcoin Gives Back Weekly Gains
contentSnippet: Spot XRP ETFs have now attracted nearly $850 million in inflows since launching in mid-November — one of the strongest altcoin ETF starts on record — suggesting long-horizon capital continues to accum

title: Here's How Much Bitcoin, XRP, Ether, Solana May Move on Friday's Inflation Report
contentSnippet: A softer inflation report could lower the 10-year Treasury yield and support cryptocurrencies.

title: IMF warns stablecoins may accelerate currency substitution, weaken central bank control
contentSnippet: The IMF warned that stablecoins could speed up currency substitution in countries with weak monetary systems.

title: OpenAI Ordered to Hand Over 20M ChatGPT Logs in NYT Copyright Case
contentSnippet: A federal judge rejected OpenAI’s bid to limit discovery, directing the company to produce de-identified user logs central to the case.

title: Stablecoin Adoption Could Stifle Central Bank Control, IMF Warns
contentSnippet: Stablecoins have the potential to broaden individuals’ access to financial services, but that may come at the cost of central banks, per IMF.

title: JPMorgan says Strategy’s resilience is key to bitcoin’s price direction in the near term
contentSnippet: JPMorgan reiterated that its bitcoin-to-gold model still points to a theoretical price of about $170,000 in the next 6–12 months.

title: First Sui-based ETF approved as 21Shares brings leveraged fund to market
contentSnippet: The 21Shares 2x SUI ETF (TXXS) marks the 74th crypto ETF to launch this year and the 128th overall, according to Bloomberg.

title: TON treasury files $420.69 million meme shelf registration to invest in tokens and Telegram AI ecosystem
contentSnippet: AlphaTON will expand its investments in TON tokens, the Telegram mini app ecosystem, and the recently launched Cocoon AI network.

title: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse Expects Bitcoin to Hit $180K Next Year
contentSnippet: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse thinks Bitcoin will be trading at $180,000 at the close of 2026, nearly double the current price.

title: Myriad Moves: Bitcoin and Ethereum Recovery Odds Rise as Traders Flip Bullish
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on where Bitcoin and Ethereum are headed next, plus odds of another major liquidation event.

title: Tokenization debate reveals gaps in perspectives between TradeFi and crypto on decentralization during SEC panel meeting
contentSnippet: As tokenization gains momentum, Wall Street and crypto executives revealed some potential rifts on how the SEC should regulate it.

title: Solana and Ethereum Network Base Are Now Connected Thanks to Coinbase and Chainlink
contentSnippet: Solana and Base are now connected thanks to a new bridge secured by Chainlink's interoperability protocol and crypto exchange Coinbase.

title: Coinbase incubated Ethereum L2 Base network rolls out bridge to Solana
contentSnippet: Popular Ethereum Layer 2 Base will now support Solana-based assets natively, and enable the export of Base assets onto Solana.

title: Privacy-First 'Alien' Identity System Aims to Prove Users Are Human in the Age of AI
contentSnippet: Alien’s privacy-focused decentralized app verifies users without storing biometrics or government IDs. Here's how it works.

title: Breakout Ethereum perps DEX Lighter rolls out spot trading
contentSnippet: Lighter also recently rolled out equities perp trading, starting with COIN and HOOD, and expanded foreign exchange offerings.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.
